text: \add Put\add* to your lips \add the\add* trumpet
like a vulture over the house of Yahweh,
because they have ⸤broken my covenant⸥\f + \fr 8:1 \ft Literally “transgressed my covenant” \f*
They appointed kings, but not through me;
they made officials, but without my knowledge.
for their\f + \fr 8:4 \ft Hebrew “his” \f* own ⸤destruction⸥.\f + \fr 8:4 \ft Literally “cut off” \f*
Your calf is rejected,\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Hebrew “he rejects” or “has rejected you” \f* \add O\add* Samaria;
How long\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Hebrew “Until when” \f* will they be incapable of innocence?
\add The\add* standing grain does not have heads;\f + \fr 8:7 \ft Hebrew “head” \f*
now they are among the nations,
like an object that no one desires.
For they have gone up \add to\add* Assyria,
a wild donkey alone to itself;
Ephraim has sold itself \add for\add* lovers.
Even though they have sold themselves to the nations,
from the burden of kings\f + \fr 8:10 \ft Hebrew “king” \f* and princes.
they became to him altars to sin \add on\add*.
I write for him myriads of my instruction;\f + \fr 8:12 \ft Or “my law” \f*
they are regarded as a strange thing.
They offer sacrifices of my choice\f + \fr 8:13 \ft Hebrew uncertain; or “loved ones” \f*
Now he will remember their iniquity
Israel has forgotten his maker and built palaces,
and Judah has multiplied fortified cities;
but I will send fire on his cities
and it will devour her strongholds.
